# <a name="error-550553-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="95c16-102">Kļūda 550/553 pievienojumprogrammā Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="95c16-102">Error 550/553 in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="95c16-103">Kad neesat mājās un nosūtījis e-pasta ziņojumu no pievienotā konta, izmantojot Outlook.com, jūsu e-pasta ziņojums, iespējams, tiek atgriezts ar 550, 553 vai relay-aizliegtu kļūdas ziņojumu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="95c16-103">When you're away from home and send an email from your connected account using Outlook.com, your email message might be returned with a 550, 553, or relay-prohibited error message.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="95c16-104">[E-pasta sinhronizācijas iestatījumu](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) pārbaude **sadaļā iestatījumi**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="95c16-104">Check your [email sync settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) at **Settings**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="95c16-105">> **Visu Outlook iestatījumu skatīšana**  >  **E-pasta ziņojums**  >  **Sinhronizēt e-pastu**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="95c16-105">> **View all Outlook settings** > **Mail** > **Sync email**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="95c16-106">Pārliecinieties, vai jūsu noklusējums no adreses ir tāds pats kā jūsu e-pasta domēna nosaukums.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="95c16-106">Make sure your default from address is the same as your email domain name.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="95c16-107">Ja jūsu e-pasta domēns ir iekļauts, nomainiet to uz outlook.com, live.com vai hotmail.com adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="95c16-107">If you have your own email domain included, change it to your outlook.com, live.com, or hotmail.com address.</span></span>
